name: postcss-copy
description: A postcss plugin to copy all assets referenced in CSS to a custom destination folder and updating the URLs.

1.1.2.name: postcss-copy
1.1.2.description: A postcss plugin to copy all assets referenced in CSS to a custom destination folder and updating the URLs.

scripts.build: npm run clean && babel src --source-maps --optional runtime --out-dir dist --ignore /tests/

6.0.0.name: postcss-copy
